name: Twilio STUN/TURN
description: A template for web server with API endpoint to get Twilio STUN/TURN data

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio Account SID (find it on https://www.twilio.com/user/account/settings)

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio Auth Token (find it on https://www.twilio.com/user/account/settings)
